item.title: Mentioned by insideTORONTO.com
item.description:
Matthew Kellway named NDP Urban Affairs lead
Beaches-East York MP Matthew Kellway will be travelling the country soon to speak with Canada's urban communities about the issues they feel need addressing. Kellway was named lead of Urban Affairs by official Opposition and NDP leader Thomas ...
